Description: Reliquary with the Pieta; the Virgin holding the body of Christ at centre, Mary Magdalene, St John and Joseph of Arimathea on r, Mary of Egypt on l; scene set inside reliquary frame with leaf ornaments, at top the resurrected Christ. Etching
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / German engravings, etchings and woodcuts c.1400-1700 (23.I)
Associated names: Representation of: St John the Evangelist
Representation of: St Joseph of Arimathaea
